Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.sceneController

Class YourTurnSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.sceneController.YourTurnSceneController
public class YourTurnSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
YourTurnSceneController handle the display of player's board.

  • Constructor Details

    • YourTurnSceneController

      public YourTurnSceneController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      handle all buttons actions and show current state playerboard.

    • chooseMarble

      public static void chooseMarble()
      show current saved chosen marbles.

    • buyCardMessage

      public static void buyCardMessage​(int slot, int cardID, java.lang.String newMessage)
      Parameters:
      slot - is DevelopmentCard's slot.
      cardID - is DevelopmentCard's cardID.
      newMessage - is the message received from Server. when receiving a BUY_CARD message from Server, add received DevelopmentCard and add message.

    • cardRemoveMessage

      public static void cardRemoveMessage​(int row, int column, int cardID, java.lang.String newMessage)
      Parameters:
      row - is one decks row.
      column - is one decks column.
      cardID - is the new DevelopmentCard's cardID.
      newMessage - is the message received from Server. when receiving a CARD_REMOVE message from Server, replace received DevelopmentCard and add message.

    • marketChangeMessage

      public static void marketChangeMessage​(boolean row, int index, java.lang.String newMessage)
      Parameters:
      row - is true for wor and false for column.
      index - is selected row or column.
      newMessage - is the message received from Server. when receiving a MARKET_CHANGE message from Server, slide market row or column and add message.

    • increaseFaithPointsMessage

      public static void increaseFaithPointsMessage​(int faithPoints, boolean Ludovico, java.lang.String newMessage)
      Parameters:
      faithPoints - is player's faithPoints.
      Ludovico - refers if Ludovico has increased his faith points.
      newMessage - is the message received from Server. when receiving a FAITH_POINTS_INCREASE message from Server, move red or black cross and add message.

    • increaseWarehouseMessage

      public static void increaseWarehouseMessage​(int depot, java.lang.String newMessage)
      Parameters:
      depot - is one Warehouse or Extra depot.
      newMessage - is the message received from Server. when receiving a INCREASE_WAREHOUSE message from Server, add resource to Warehouse and add message.

    • switchDepotMessage

      public static void switchDepotMessage​(int depot1, int depot2, java.lang.String newMessage)
      Parameters:
      depot1 - is one Warehouse or Extra depot.
      depot2 - is one Warehouse or Extra depot.
      newMessage - is the message received from Server. when receiving a SWITCH_DEPOT message from Server, swap depots, set thier resources and add message.

    • leaderCardActivationMessage

      public static void leaderCardActivationMessage​(java.lang.String newMessage)
      Parameters:
      newMessage - is the message received from Server. when receiving a LEADER_ACTIVATION message from Server, change LeaderCard opacity and add message.

    • leaderCardDiscardMessage

      public static void leaderCardDiscardMessage​(java.lang.String newMessage)
      Parameters:
      newMessage - is the message received from Server. when receiving a LEADER_DISCARD message from Server, remove one LeaderCard and add message.

    • vaticanReportMessage

      public static void vaticanReportMessage​(java.lang.String newMessage)
      Parameters:
      newMessage - is the message received from Server. when receiving a VATICAN_REPORT message from Server, add Vatican report tiles and add message.

    • whiteConversionMessage

      public static void whiteConversionMessage()
      disable all buttons and enable LeaderCards.

    • choseSlotMessage

      public static void choseSlotMessage​(int slot1, int slot2, int slot3)
      Parameters:
      slot1 - is one available slot.
      slot2 - is one available slot.
      slot3 - is one available slot. didable all buttons and enable available slots buttons.

    • modifiedResource

      public static void modifiedResource()
      modify warehouse and strongbox resource based on saved one on Client.

    • yourTurn

      public static void yourTurn()
      enable all action buttons. in case it's not possible activate or discard leader anymore, disable their buttons.

    • disableProductions

      public static void disableProductions()
      disable all production buttons.

    • production

      public static void production()
      disable all action buttons and enable end production button.

    • endTurn

      public static void endTurn()
      disable all action buttons and enable end turn button. in case it's still possible activate or discard leader, enable their buttons.

    • notYourTurn

      public static void notYourTurn()
      disable all buttons except radiobutOtherPlayboard.

    • endGame

      public static void endGame()
      disable all buttons except radiobutOtherPlayboard and end game buttons.
